comments: Professor Heafner was very nice and he made the entire bio101 experience exciting. I could tell he truly loves what he does and is extremely knowledgeable.

Mr. Heafner is the worst professor I\'ve ever had in my entire collegiate career. He taught straight from powerpoint, filled with slides that contained information that didn\'t correspond with the book material. Tests were filled with questions not from lectures or book. He doesn\'t have a doctorate, and it\'s very evident. Don\'t take him.
